### Ancient Greece.

Story is tailed by an ancient book from Greece, the story begins with a Prophecy to the King, By the oracle of Apollo, on how a king's son will kill his father and marry his mother. By then the King's wife was Pregnant, and the oracle prophecy was that the child will be born and in his adulthood, the child will kill his father and marry his Mother.

When the child was born, the parents decided to throw him to the wildness so he may die and the prophecy may not com to pass. Unknown to them, the child was picked up by an old man, the child grew in size and age, and in his adulthood he heard about the story,

After he knew the story, he started to run to his father and on the the way he met an old man, because of hanger he killed an old man, little did he know that, that was the King of Greece and his father, And as he moved on he went to a King's palace and he served the city by solving a riddle.

![](artface2.jpg)

After he served the city, the price was the Queen, so he married her, little did he know that, that was his Mother, the dead King's wife. And in his oath by sworn  that, whoever i find out what or who killed the King, will be exile from the land. Then the Oracles said that he was the one who killed the King. So he was exiled from the land, and the lesson of the age was made at a day of his depart.
